snippet.title: INTJ // RiPiT HOOK's Nightmare // TRAILER
snippet.description:
! WARNING ! POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY. ! WARNING ! 

RiPiT H00K Nightmare Edition is a custom manipulated DATA EAST 1992 HOOK pinball machine.

The unit acts as a 100% experimental physical custom pop-art asset, using a ready-made pinball machine.

The game was designed using ripping techniques and modding which follows the same old ideas of the popular culture.

The buttons of the machine turned into digital joysticks, to play along with the original pinball game-play and re-explore futuristic digital gaming behaviors using retro machinery with new computing kits.

Prototype created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the trailer.

I challenge you to experience it, contact me, or even buy a coffee ;)

https://intj.itch.io/

Join our exclusive Discord community:
https://discord.gg/fW9jjurxXv
